     invariant       true        // no more invariant

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default Value<?> getActualExportedVariableValueReference(java.lang.String modelURI, java.lang.String sourceVariableName, java.lang.Class<?> sourceVariableType)
      search among descendant HIOA of the model with URI modelURI the atomic one that defines the designated variable or its alias and return the reference to the placeholder for its value.
      default StaticVariableDescriptor[] getExportedVariables()
      return the variables exported by this HIOA.

      default boolean isImportedVariable(java.lang.String name, java.lang.Class<?> type)
      return true if this model imports the designated variable.
      default void setImportedVariableValueReference(java.lang.String modelURI, java.lang.String sinkVariableName, java.lang.Class<?> sinkVariableType, Value<?> value)
      search among descendant HIOA of the model with URI modelURI all of the the atomic ones that use the designated variable or its aliases and set in them the reference to the placeholder for its value.

      • isExportedVariable

        default boolean isExportedVariable(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.Class<?> type)
        return true if this model exports the designated variable.

        Contract

         pre     name != null && !name.isEmpty()
 pre     type != null
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the variable.
        type - type of the variable.
        Returns:
        true if this model exports the designated variable.

      • getActualExportedVariableValueReference

        default Value<?> getActualExportedVariableValueReference(java.lang.String modelURI,
                                                         java.lang.String sourceVariableName,
                                                         java.lang.Class<?> sourceVariableType)
        search among descendant HIOA of the model with URI modelURI the atomic one that defines the designated variable or its alias and return the reference to the placeholder for its value.

        Contract

         pre     modelURI != null && !modelURI.isEmpty()
 pre     sourceVariableName != null && !sourceVariableName.isEmpty()
 pre     sourceVariableType != null
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        modelURI - URI of the model that exports the designated variable.
        sourceVariableName - name of the sought variable.
        sourceVariableType - type of the sought variable.
        Returns:
        the reference to the placeholder for the value of the designated exported variable.

      • setImportedVariableValueReference

        default void setImportedVariableValueReference(java.lang.String modelURI,
                                               java.lang.String sinkVariableName,
                                               java.lang.Class<?> sinkVariableType,
                                               Value<?> value)
        search among descendant HIOA of the model with URI modelURI all of the the atomic ones that use the designated variable or its aliases and set in them the reference to the placeholder for its value.

        Contract

         pre     modelURI != null && !modelURI.isEmpty()
 pre     sinkVariableName != null && !sinkVariableName.isEmpty()
 pre     sinkVariableType != null
 pre     value != null
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Parameters:
        modelURI - URI of the model that imports the designated variable.
        sinkVariableName - name of the sought variable.
        sinkVariableType - type of the sought variable.
        value - the placeholder for the value of the designated imported variable.
